statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 8 \\ 2 \\ 5 \\ 13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ -2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 4 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ 10 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
